title: How to Make Breakfast Sausage Rolls

steps.headline: Take Pillsbury brand croissants out of packaging.
steps.description: Read directions and preheat the oven.

steps.headline: Roll out the croissants without taking them apart on a cookie sheet.
steps.description: (Croissant dough should be laid out flat like a sheet of paper.) Do not cook croissants yet!!!!!! !

steps.headline: Open pack of sausages and place them into a skillet, heated on about eight or nine.
Chop up the sausage into small pieces with a wooden spoon.
Spread cooked sausage evenly onto the croissant dough on the cookie sheet.
Add cheese if desired, simply sprinkle grated cheese on top.)
Roll the croissant dough up like a camping bag carefully.
steps.description: When you finish, you should see the swirl on the open sides.

steps.headline: Cut up the roll like a loaf of bread with a knife.
steps.description: Spread them out evenly on the cookie sheet.

steps.headline: Put the pan in the preheated oven for the allotted time on the croissant package.
Wait until the time is up on your oven.
steps.description: See if your sausage rolls are golden brown. If so, take out and let cool for 2-3 minutes.

text: Take Pillsbury brand croissants out of packaging. Read directions and preheat the oven. Roll out the croissants without taking them apart on a cookie sheet. (Croissant dough should be laid out flat like a sheet of paper.) Do not cook croissants yet!!!!!! ! Open pack of sausages and place them into a skillet, heated on about eight or nine.  Chop up the sausage into small pieces with a wooden spoon. Cook until brown. Spread cooked sausage evenly onto the croissant dough on the cookie sheet.  Add cheese if desired, simply sprinkle grated cheese on top.)  Roll the croissant dough up like a camping bag carefully. When you finish, you should see the swirl on the open sides. Cut up the roll like a loaf of bread with a knife. Spread them out evenly on the cookie sheet. Put the pan in the preheated oven for the allotted time on the croissant package.  Wait until the time is up on your oven. See if your sausage rolls are golden brown. If so, take out and let cool for 2-3 minutes. Eat and enjoy!
